items.title: UK social media campaigners among five denied US visas
items.description: The Trump administration bans five people who have called for tech regulation from entering the country.

items.title: Ho Ho No! Santa pulled over for speeding in Ohio
items.description: Santa is speeding through his Christmas deliveries, but a sheriff had to stop him for "flying a little too fast".

items.title: Zelensky moves towards demilitarised zones in latest peace plan for Ukraine
items.description: On the key question of Ukraine's eastern Donbas, Zelensky says a "free economic zone" is a potential option.

items.title: Watch: Huge fireball as tanker explodes on Italian motorway
items.description: The vehicle had earlier been involved in a crash and everyone in the surrounding area was safely evacuated before the blast.

items.title: Venezuela accuses US of 'extortion' over seizure of oil tankers
items.description: An emergency meeting of the UN Security Council was called to discuss the US seizure of two tankers.
